metadata.name: Japanese ichidan-verb (mixed)
metadata.description: Mixed orthography group for type='ichidan-verb' — total 9 (hiragana: 2, both: 7).

entries.meaning: to exist (animate); to be (someone is here)

example.en: My little brother is at home now.
notes: Location often marked with に/で; existence uses に.

entries.meaning: to be able to; can do; to be made; to be completed

example.ja: 私は日本語が少しできます。
example.en: I can speak a little Japanese.
notes: Ability often uses が (日本語ができる).

entries.meaning: to tidy up; to put in order; to clean up

example.ja: 部屋を片付けましょう。

entries.meaning: to attach; to add; to turn on (a light); to set (a rule/condition)

example.ja: 電気を付けてください。
notes: Transitive; 電気を付ける = turn on.

entries.meaning: to stop (something); to turn off; to park (a car)

example.ja: 車をここに止めないでください。
example.en: Please don’t park the car here.

entries.meaning: to come off; to be removed; to be obtained/caught

notes: Intransitive; subject often marked with が.

entries.meaning: to hang (something); to put on; to apply; to make a call

example.ja: 友だちに電話を掛けます。

entries.meaning: to go out; to leave (home) for a while

example.ja: これから買い物に出かけます。
notes: Destination often marked with に (〜に出かける).

example.ja: 駅の近くでいい店を見つけました。
example.en: I found a good shop near the station.
